item.title: Avocado Market Research
item.description: Introduction Data Pre-Processing Load Data Load Packages Clean Data Exploratory Data Analysis Distribution Avocado Prices Avocado Volume Elasticity Introduction The following report intends to analyze avocado prices and sales volume from 2015 to early 2018 across the US. In addition to a thorough exploratory analysis, Iâ€™ll also try to calculate the price elasticity of demand for each individual market. The dataset comes from the Hass Avocado Board.
